tutorial.title: How to Enable "Silence Unknown Callers"
tutorial.subtitle: Follow these 3 simple steps on your iPhone to stop spam calls from ringing.
tutorial.pro_tip: Can't find it? Swipe down in Settings to reveal the search bar and type "Silence".
tutorial.step1_text: Unlock your iPhone and open the Settings app. Scroll down until you find the list of apps.
tutorial.step2_text: Tap on Phone. This is where you control how your iPhone handles incoming calls and spam.
tutorial.step3_text: Scroll down to Silence Unknown Callers and toggle the switch to ON (Green).
tutorial.completion_note: That's it! RingBack will now filter the silent calls and notify you on your Mac if they are safe.
